issue.title: [C++] RETURN_IF_ERROR(ctx) should be namespaced
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5976](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5976). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
RETURN_IF_ERROR is a common macro, it shouldn't be exposed in a header file without namespacing to Arrow.
